quote: I'm very happy with my life. I am what I am. I don't worry about anything that I can't control. That's a really good lesson in life.
author: Tom Watson

quote: We ought to do good to others as simply as a horse runs, or a bee makes honey, or a vine bears grapes season after season without thinking of the grapes it has borne.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: No man is good enough to govern any woman without her consent.
author: Susan B. Anthony

quote: There is no harm in repeating a good thing.
author: Plato

quote: In most professions, if you stay at the office an extra four hours every day, you're gonna impress the boss. You're gonna get that promotion; you're gonna get that raise. You're gonna at least have job security. But with acting, if you're really ambitious and you have a good work ethic and are really good at your job, it might not really matter.
author: Jason Bateman

quote: You can live your life angry, bitter, mad at somebody or even guilty, not letting go of your own mistakes, but you won't receive the good things God has in store.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Good manners sometimes means simply putting up with other people's bad manners.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Discontent, blaming, complaining, self-pity cannot serve as a foundation for a good future, no matter how much effort you make.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Being a good actor isn't easy. Being a man is even harder. I want to be both before I'm done.
author: James Dean

quote: To understand me, you have to meet me and be around me. And then only if I'm in a good mood - don't meet me in a bad mood.
author: Avril Lavigne

quote: If you're being ignored, that's a good time to concentrate on finding yourself and creating your own mystery.
author: Lykke Li

quote: I'm a pretty good winner. I'm a terrible loser. And I rub it in pretty good when I win.
author: Tom Brady

quote: There are two main jobs in acting - the first one is to be a good actor, and the second one is to convince everyone that you're a good actor.
author: Laurence Fox

quote: Something I try to instill in others is to just be a good person. It's a decision you make a million times a day. But if you just keep trying, good stuff comes to you in an ordained way.
author: Chance The Rapper

quote: People will travel anywhere for good food - it's crazy.
author: Rene Redzepi

quote: Plans are only good intentions unless they immediately degenerate into hard work.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: It takes a great man to be a good listener.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: Tramping is too easy with all this money. My days were more exciting when I was penniless and had to forage around for my next meal... I've decided that I'm going to live this life for some time to come. The freedom and simple beauty of it is just too good to pass up.
author: Christopher McCandless

quote: Now and then it's good to pause in our pursuit of happiness and just be happy.
author: Guillaume Apollinaire

quote: Whenever a doctor cannot do good, he must be kept from doing harm.
author: Hippocrates

quote: People like to say that the conflict is between good and evil. The real conflict is between truth and lies.
author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quote: Never set limits, go after your dreams, don't be afraid to push the boundaries. And laugh a lot - it's good for you!
author: Paula Radcliffe

quote: What I dream of is an art of balance, of purity and serenity devoid of troubling or depressing subject matter - a soothing, calming influence on the mind, rather like a good armchair which provides relaxation from physical fatigue.
author: Henri Matisse

quote: The great thing about getting older is that you become more mellow. Things aren't as black and white, and you become much more tolerant. You can see the good in things much more easily rather than getting enraged as you used to do when you were young.
author: Maeve Binchy

quote: Life is not a matter of holding good cards, but sometimes, playing a poor hand well.
author: Jack London

quote: Fitness starts at home. What you eat is what you will look, just as what you sow is what you reap. Eat good food: eat fruits, vegetables, healthy grains, and don't go for sweet and trite food.
author: Rakul Preet Singh

quote: One should never live with regrets or with 'what if.' I've loved the good times, and I have learned from the bad. All in all, it's been a pretty fabulous life for me.
author: Ivana Trump

quote: A real man loves and respects his wife and is not only a good father but a man that his kids want to call 'Daddy.'
author: Frank Abagnale

quote: Every good citizen adds to the strength of a nation.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: Real beauty is to be true to oneself. That's what makes me feel good.
author: Laetitia Casta

quote: You have to be very, very good looking to get ahead in motion pictures.
author: Elaine Stritch

quote: No good fish goes anywhere without a porpoise.
author: Lewis Carroll

quote: I think most of us are raised with preconceived notions of the choices we're supposed to make. We waste so much time making decisions based on someone else's idea of our happiness - what will make you a good citizen or a good wife or daughter or actress. Nobody says, 'Just be happy - go be a cobbler or go live with goats.'
author: Sandra Bullock

quote: This is important: to get to know people, listen, expand the circle of ideas. The world is crisscrossed by roads that come closer together and move apart, but the important thing is that they lead towards the Good.
author: Pope Francis

quote: The only purpose for which power can be rightfully exercised over any member of a civilized community, against his will, is to prevent harm to others. His own good, either physical or moral, is not sufficient warrant.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: If I don't laugh at least 20 times a day - it hasn't been a good day.
author: Jordin Sparks

quote: All women think men look good in suits. To be honest, I like the way they look, too.
author: Liam Hemsworth

quote: The best executive is one who has sense enough to pick good people to do what he wants done, and self-restraint enough to keep from meddling with them while they do it.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Love sought is good, but given unsought, is better.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: I must say I find television very educational. The minute somebody turns it on, I go to the library and read a good book.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: A conversation is a dialogue, not a monologue. That's why there are so few good conversations: due to scarcity, two intelligent talkers seldom meet.
author: Truman Capote

quote: Ten percent of the big fish still remain. There are still some blue whales. There are still some krill in Antarctica. There are a few oysters in Chesapeake Bay. Half the coral reefs are still in pretty good shape, a jeweled belt around the middle of the planet. There's still time, but not a lot, to turn things around.
author: Sylvia Earle

quote: If you're not really having a good time, it's not worth it.
author: Kyle Chandler

quote: When you grow up by the sea, you spend a good deal of time looking at the horizon. You wonder what on Earth the waves might bring - and where the sea might deposit you - until one day you know you have lived between two places, the scene of arrival and the point of departure.
author: Andrew O'Hagan

quote: I think the path is different for everybody. Go after the doors that are open to you. That has always been my motto getting into the music business. Do the things that seem to be good opportunities and work hard at it. Try to make good decisions and be nice. Hopefully all of that will pay off at some point.
author: Chris Stapleton

quote: Doing good holds the power to transform us on the inside, and then ripple out in ever-expanding circles that positively impact the world at large.
author: Shari Arison

quote: The line between good and evil is permeable and almost anyone can be induced to cross it when pressured by situational forces.
author: Philip Zimbardo

quote: The more we come out and do good to others, the more our hearts will be purified, and God will be in them.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Derive happiness in oneself from a good day's work, from illuminating the fog that surrounds us.
author: Henri Matisse

quote: All good writing is swimming under water and holding your breath.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Capitalism is the astounding belief that the most wickedest of men will do the most wickedest of things for the greatest good of everyone.
author: John Maynard Keynes

quote: What is interesting is the power and the impact of social media... So we must try to use social media in a good way.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: A bad system will beat a good person every time.
author: W. Edwards Deming

quote: It is very important to generate a good attitude, a good heart, as much as possible. From this, happiness in both the short term and the long term for both yourself and others will come.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Life is neither good or evil, but only a place for good and evil.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: If you look in real life, it is very hard to describe people as good people, bad people, heroes or villains. People aren't bad people. They all have their justifications.
author: Lennie James

quote: See, I have set before you this day life and good, death and evil... I have set before you life and death, blessing and curse; therefore choose life.
author: Moses

quote: Don't worry about being a star, worry about doing good work, and all that will come to you.
author: Ice Cube

quote: Good governance with good intentions is the hallmark of our government. Implementation with integrity is our core passion.
author: Narendra Modi

quote: If you believe that your best years are behind you, you've guaranteed they are; I'm going to dance into that good night, with the oldies turned up loud.
author: Gina Barreca

quote: Good artists copy, great artists steal.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: To be a good citizen, it's important to be able to put yourself in other people's shoes and see the big picture. If everything you see is rooted in your own identity, that becomes difficult or impossible.
author: Eli Pariser

quote: Clock watchers never seem to be having a good time.
author: James Cash Penney

quote: Find a good teacher that will keep the game fun. Work hard and don't be afraid to have success or disappointment. That is what golf is all about.
author: Paula Creamer

quote: I believe that if you don't derive a deep sense of purpose from what you do, if you don't come radiantly alive several times a day, if you don't feel deeply grateful at the tremendous good fortune that has been bestowed on you, then you are wasting your life. And life is too short to waste.
author: Srikumar Rao

quote: And I believe that good journalism, good television, can make our world a better place.
author: Christiane Amanpour

quote: When you are older you will understand how precious little things, seemingly of no value in themselves, can be loved and prized above all price when they convey the love and thoughtfulness of a good heart.
author: Edwin Booth

quote: Good advice is always certain to be ignored, but that's no reason not to give it.
author: Agatha Christie

quote: My idea of a good night out is staying in.
author: Martin Freeman

quote: The person earning the federal minimum wage of $7.25 isn't going out to eat at restaurants. They're not taking piano lessons. They're not going to the gym or the yoga studio. They're not sending mom flowers on Mother's day. What good is this person in the economy? If you raise it to $15 an hour, they're doing all of those things.
author: Nick Hanauer

quote: When I grew up, in Taiwan, the Korean War was seen as a good war, where America protected Asia. It was sort of an extension of World War II. And it was, of course, the peak of the Cold War. People in Taiwan were generally proAmerican. The Korean War made Japan. And then the Vietnam War made Taiwan. There is some truth to that.
author: Ang Lee

quote: People are always selling the idea that people with mental illness are suffering. I think madness can be an escape. If things are not so good, you maybe want to imagine something better.
author: John Forbes Nash, Jr.

quote: My grandfather was an amazing man. You talk about character and integrity, everyone who knew him, whether they agreed with him or not, said, 'George Romney is a good man, and he sticks to his principles: a man of honesty and hard work, integrity.'
author: Tagg Romney

quote: He who is too busy doing good finds no time to be good.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: There is a lot of talk now about metal detectors and gun control. Both are good things. But they are no more a solution than forks and spoons are a solution to world hunger.
author: Anna Quindlen

quote: I'm blessed with good genes, but I also love to look my best self.
author: Farrah Abraham

quote: The definition of success to me is not necessarily a price tag, not fame, but having a good life, and being able to say I did the right thing at the end of the day.
author: Jeremy Luke

quote: I'm surrounded by nothing but great people. I've been blessed with that, so really, I've got no choice but to be an all-around good person.
author: Tim Duncan

quote: You can't change the world alone - you will need some help - and to truly get from your starting point to your destination takes friends, colleagues, the good will of strangers and a strong coxswain to guide them.
author: William H. McRaven

quote: Paris is always a good idea.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: I believe that God knows what each of us wants and needs. It's not necessary for us to make it to church on Sunday to reach Him. You can find Him anyplace. And if that sounds heretical, my source is pretty good: Matthew, Five to Seven, The Sermon on the Mount.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: The way to gain a good reputation is to endeavor to be what you desire to appear.
author: Socrates

quote: I'm just here for good times, man. I want people to have the best time ever. Especially if they're around me.
author: Travis Scott

quote: There are good leaders who actively guide and bad leaders who actively misguide. Hence, leadership is about persuasion, presentation and people skills.
author: Shiv Khera

quote: There is something good in all seeming failures. You are not to see that now. Time will reveal it. Be patient.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: Remember, the storm is a good opportunity for the pine and the cypress to show their strength and their stability.
author: Ho Chi Minh

quote: The things that have always been important: to be a good man, to try to live my life the way God would have me, to turn it over to Him that His will might be worked in my life, to do my work without looking back, to give it all I've got, and to take pride in my work as an honest performer.
author: Johnny Cash

quote: Some of my happiest moments are the ones I spend with my husband, a few close relatives, and a handful of very good friends who know me well and like me anyway.
author: Robin Marantz Henig

quote: Make women rational creatures, and free citizens, and they will quickly become good wives; - that is, if men do not neglect the duties of husbands and fathers.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quote: A good farmer is nothing more nor less than a handy man with a sense of humus.
author: E. B. White

quote: Nothing good ever comes of violence.
author: Martin Luther

quote: Goodness is the only investment that never fails.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: If you love those who love you, what credit is that to you? For even sinners love those who love them. And if you do good to those who do good to you, what credit is that to you? For even sinners do the same.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: The fact is that people are good, Give people affection and security, and they will give affection and be secure in their feelings and their behavior.
author: Abraham Maslow

quote: I think we consider too much the good luck of the early bird and not enough the bad luck of the early worm.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: A good boss makes his men realize they have more ability than they think they have so that they consistently do better work than they thought they could.
author: Charles Erwin Wilson

quote: Putting forward your positive energy connects you back to basic human values which we all share. Good Deeds Day shows that no matter the size of the gesture, a smile that brightens someone else's day or volunteering in your community, we can all take active part in making a difference.
author: Shari Arison

quote: I collect watches because I'm always late, and I need to know exactly how late I'm going to be - in order to come up with a good excuse.
author: Colin Hanks

quote: All holidays can be good times.
author: John Clayton

quote: Sex without love is a meaningless experience, but as far as meaningless experiences go its pretty damn good.
author: Woody Allen

quote: If we went by the world's definition of who I'm supposed to be because I look weird... 'Well, surely, this guy can't have a productive life, surely, he doesn't have a sense of humor. Surely, he can't love life.' We stereotype people in this world. And so... if the world thinks you're not good enough, it's a lie, you know. Get a second opinion.
author: Nick Vujicic

quote: As long as I'm a good person and I do things from the heart, that's all that matters.
author: Gisele Bundchen

quote: Everyone can train hard when they are feeling good. But it's the days when you're feeling bad that you have to step up. That's when champions step up. They pull through.
author: Chad le Clos

quote: I really live a simple life and don't need very much to feel good and happy. Don't get me wrong; I believe you should get what you earn. Sometimes you have to fight for it.
author: Kevin Eubanks

quote: There is only one rule for being a good talker - learn to listen.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: A good heart is better than all the heads in the world.
author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: If you want that good feeling that comes from doing things for other folks then you have to pay for it in abuse and misunderstanding.
author: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: Do and act on what you believe to be right, and you'll wake up the next morning feeling good about yourself.
author: Janet Reno

quote: It's not vanity to feel you have a right to be beautiful. Women are taught to feel we're not good enough, that we must live up to someone else's standards. But my aim is to cherish myself as I am.
author: Elle Macpherson

quote: I do believe that every person has an equal opportunity to be a good and wise judge regardless of their background or life experiences.
author: Sonia Sotomayor

quote: The Jews don't like Farrakhan, so they call me Hitler. Well, that's a good name. Hitler was a very great man.
author: Louis Farrakhan

quote: China's republican politics is like a child who just started schooling. He must have a good teacher and be surrounded by good friends. By the same token, the Chinese people, new to the republican politics, must be educated properly. The revolutionary government should be the people's tutor to impart advanced awareness and experience.
author: Sun Yat-sen

quote: A woman is only a woman, but a good cigar is a smoke.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: The test of good citizenship is loyalty to country.
author: Bainbridge Colby

quote: I've always been pretty independent, no matter what situation: good, bad, ugly, happy, sad. I dig deep, and I get over it.
author: Mel B

quote: Fighting corruption is not just good governance. It's self-defense. It's patriotism.
author: Joe Biden

quote: Be true to the game, because the game will be true to you. If you try to shortcut the game, then the game will shortcut you. If you put forth the effort, good things will be bestowed upon you. That's truly about the game, and in some ways that's about life too.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: If you're not having a good time, find something else that gives you some joy in life.
author: Penny Marshall

quote: If you don't think every day is a good day, just try missing one.
author: Cavett Robert

quote: I don't judge others. I say if you feel good with what you're doing, let your freak flag fly.
author: Sarah Jessica Parker

quote: Sustainability is no longer about doing less harm. It's about doing more good.
author: Jochen Zeitz

quote: English language is the most universal language in history, way more than the Latin of Julius Caesar. It's the most punderful language because its vocabulary has a certain critical mass that makes a lingo good for punning.
author: Richard Lederer

quote: Temperance is moderation in the things that are good and total abstinence from the things that are foul.
author: Frances E. Willard

quote: If you have a good support system like your family and your friends around you, then you can't go wrong. So just believe in yourself, do you your thing, and stay strong in what you believe in.
author: Roman Reigns

quote: I used to do my best thinking while staring out airplane windows. The seat-back video system put a stop to that. Now I sit and watch old' Friends' and 'Everybody Loves Raymond' episodes. Walking is good, but here again, technology has interfered. I like to listen to iTunes while I walk home. I guess I don't think anymore.
author: Mary Roach

quote: A good reputation is more valuable than money.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: I believe that my worth is not measured by what I do, by the honors that are bestowed upon me, or by material wealth that I might obtain. Instead, I am measured by the courage I show while standing for my beliefs, by the dedication I exhibit to ensure my word is good, and the resolve I undertake to establish my actions and deeds as honorable.
author: Burgess Owens

quote: Your karma should be good, and everything else will follow. Your good karma will always win over your bad luck.
author: Rohit Shetty

quote: I think there should be a good balance between being a good student and being able to enjoy your high school life.
author: Vanessa Lachey

quote: The difference between an amateur and a professional is in their habits. An amateur has amateur habits. A professional has professional habits. We can never free ourselves from habit. But we can replace bad habits with good ones.
author: Steven Pressfield

quote: Win or lose, I'll feel good about myself. That's what is important.
author: Mary Docter

quote: Win or lose, I always like to get back to my friends and family. They keep me grounded. When I'm home with my friends, I'm always the same Gabriel. I'm no better or worse in their eyes because of my results. It's good to be with your true friends. It always reminds me of where I'm from and who I am.
author: Gabriel Medina

quote: It is a good thing for an uneducated man to read books of quotations.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: I would say that a good shoe is exactly like a good wine. These shoes are going to stay and last for a long time.
author: Christian Louboutin

quote: A hard beginning maketh a good ending.
author: John Heywood

quote: People are always good company when they are doing what they really enjoy.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: People write negatives things, cause they feel that's what sells. Good news to them, doesn't sell.
author: Michael Jackson

quote: I'm lucky to be part of a team who help to make me look good, and they deserve as much of the credit for my success as I do for the hard work we have all put in on the training ground.
author: Lionel Messi

quote: I think that the good and the great are only separated by the willingness to sacrifice.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: I'm a big fan of working out on my own. I put my headphones on and I'm pretty good at self-motivating. At the end of the day, I enjoy it. Once I'm there and once I get going, I tend to love it, and I feel good.
author: Chris Evans

quote: The only freedom which deserves the name is that of pursuing our own good, in our own way, so long as we do not attempt to deprive others of theirs, or impede their efforts to obtain it.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: Find the good. It's all around you. Find it, showcase it and you'll start believing in it.
author: Jesse Owens

quote: My parents are good role models because they've worked hard and gave me a happy childhood.
author: Sophie Ellis-Bextor

quote: Not life, but good life, is to be chiefly valued.
author: Socrates

quote: I have always believed, and I still believe, that whatever good or bad fortune may come our way we can always give it meaning and transform it into something of value.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: Sometimes we look back and 10 years from now we think, 'Boy, those were great old days.' Well, you know, we're living in the good old days.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: I'm not good at future planning. I don't plan at all. I don't know what I'm doing tomorrow. I don't have a day planner and I don't have a diary. I completely live in the now, not in the past, not in the future.
author: Heath Ledger

quote: The common question that gets asked in business is, 'why?' That's a good question, but an equally valid question is, 'why not?'
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: Live fast, die young, and leave a good looking corpse.
author: John Derek

quote: I know my strong points: I work hard, I have talent, I'm funny, and I'm a good person.
author: Pink

quote: Glamour is about feeling good in your own skin.
author: Zoe Saldana

quote: You only do good work when you're taking risks and pushing yourself.
author: Sally Hawkins

quote: I don't like to do much with my hair - which is good, because I don't know how! I just always make sure I have a great haircut.
author: Chyler Leigh

quote: Cooking is not difficult. Everyone has taste, even if they don't realize it. Even if you're not a great chef, there's nothing to stop you understanding the difference between what tastes good and what doesn't.
author: Gerard Depardieu

quote: Honesty and integrity are absolutely essential for success in life - all areas of life. The really good news is that anyone can develop both honesty and integrity.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Where would you be without friends? The people to pick you up when you need lifting? We come from homes far from perfect, so you end up almost parent and sibling to your friends - your own chosen family. There's nothing like a really loyal, dependable, good friend. Nothing.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: We want to do a lot of stuff; we're not in great shape. We didn't get a good night's sleep. We're a little depressed. Coffee solves all these problems in one delightful little cup.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: Associate with men of good quality if you esteem your own reputation; for it is better to be alone than in bad company.
author: George Washington

quote: It is the greatest good to the greatest number of people which is the measure of right and wrong.
author: Jeremy Bentham

quote: It's good to be selfish. But not so self-centered that you never listen to other people.
author: Hugh Hefner

quote: A youth, when at home, should be filial and, abroad, respectful to his elders. He should be earnest and truthful. He should overflow in love to all and cultivate the friendship of the good. When he has time and opportunity, after the performance of these things, he should employ them in polite studies.
author: Confucius

quote: What is life? A madness. What is life? An illusion, a shadow, a story. And the greatest good is little enough; for all life is a dream, and dreams themselves are only dreams.
author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quote: I think sportsmanship is knowing that it is a game, that we are only as a good as our opponents, and whether you win or lose, to always give 100 percent.
author: Sue Wicks

quote: I'm just cruising, doing me, having a good time and focusing on getting better.
author: Alistair Overeem

quote: Virtue is persecuted more by the wicked than it is loved by the good.
author: Buddha

quote: I have certain things that I stand for, certain things that I believe in, and if you don't like it and you tell me to go to hell, I think that's your God-given right as a fan. It's one of those deals where I'm that one guy who is outside of that realm of good guy, bad guy. I'm just me, and it elicits a response both positive and negative.
author: John Cena

quote: The best portion of a good man's life is his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and of love.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: I have no plan. I will leave it to the good things and good times to find me.
author: Nimrat Kaur

quote: Patience is the secret to good food.
author: Gail Simmons

quote: A good education is a foundation for a better future.
author: Elizabeth Warren

quote: If you want to feel good, you have to go out and do some good.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Inspiration comes from so many sources. Music, other fiction, the non-fiction I read, TV shows, films, news reports, people I know, stories I hear, misheard words or lyrics, dreams... Motivation? The memory of the rush I get from a really good writing session - even on a bad day, I know I'll find that again if I keep going.
author: Trudi Canavan

quote: Be unpredictable, be real, be interesting. Tell a good story.
author: James Dashner

quote: I'm not saying that putting on makeup will change the world or even your life, but it can be a first step in learning things about yourself you may never have discovered otherwise. At worst, you could make a big mess and have a good laugh.
author: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: So what does a good teacher do? Create tension - but just the right amount.
author: Donald Norman

quote: Photography is like a moment, an instant. You need a half-second to get the photo. So it's good to capture people when they are themselves.
author: Patrick Demarchelier

quote: The natural desire of good men is knowledge.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: One only dies once, and if one does not die well, a good opportunity is lost and will not present itself again.
author: Jose Rizal

quote: The real lover of cats is one who demands a clearer adjustment to the universe than ordinary household platitudes provide; one who refuses to swallow the sentimental notion that all good people love dogs, children, and horses while all bad people dislike and are disliked by such.
author: H. P. Lovecraft

quote: True love does not only encompass the things that make you feel good, it also holds you to a standard of accountability.
author: Monica Johnson

quote: Our higher education system is one of the things that makes America exceptional. There's no place else that has the assets we do when it comes to higher education. People from all over the world aspire to come here and study here. And that is a good thing.
author: Barack Obama

quote: An organization, no matter how well designed, is only as good as the people who live and work in it.
author: Dee Hock

quote: Virtue looks good but it only suits imposing figures.
author: Frank Wedekind

quote: It's funny what memory does, isn't it? My favorite holiday tradition might not have happened more than once or twice. But because it is such a good memory, so encapsulating of everything I love about the holidays, in my mind it happened every year. Without fail.
author: Molly O'Keefe

quote: First, I want to pay tribute to Diana myself. She was an exceptional and gifted human being. In good times and bad, she never lost her capacity to smile and laugh, nor to inspire others with her warmth and kindness. I admired and respected her - for her energy and commitment to others, and especially for her devotion to her two boys.
author: Queen Elizabeth II

quote: I have a family, loving aunts, and a good home. No, on the surface I seem to have everything except my one true friend. All I think about when I'm with friends is having a good time. I can't bring myself to talk about anything but ordinary everyday things. We don't seem to be able to get any closer, and that's the problem.
author: Anne Frank

quote: I believe that singing is the key to long life, a good figure, a stable temperament, increased intelligence, new friends, super self-confidence, heightened sexual attractiveness, and a better sense of humor.
author: Brian Eno

quote: Stay open-minded; stay focused. Train hard and train smart. For me, the older I get, the smarter I have to train also, because the recovery time is longer. Work on everything: become a well-rounded fighter - don't just be good at one thing; be good at everything.
author: Brock Lesnar

quote: It's good as an artist to always remember to see things in a new, weird way.
author: Tim Burton

quote: Whatever is done for love always occurs beyond good and evil.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Words - so innocent and powerless as they are, as standing in a dictionary, how potent for good and evil they become in the hands of one who knows how to combine them.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: A good mustache makes a man for many reasons.
author: John Oates

quote: Shallow understanding from people of good will is more frustrating than absolute misunderstanding from people of ill will.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: A good fragrance should have a certain personality that makes people identify the scent with you.
author: Shakira

quote: When you realize who the good people are in your life, you're so lucky.
author: Sophia Bush

quote: I'm probably wouldn't do anything differently if I had to do it again. Every little thing that happens to you, good and bad, becomes a little piece of the puzzle of who you become. Every successful person you read about - Warren Buffett, Bill Gates - they all say pretty much the same thing. 'Do what you love.' I know I did.
author: David Foster

quote: Sometimes I think we live in a world where, even when things are good, people always feel unsatisfied with wherever they are, so I think first I just want to enjoy being happy where I am now and not let my ambition take away from being in the moment.
author: Jacob Whitesides

quote: I think every girl has a little bit of rebellion inside. It's always fun to not follow every trend and not be the perfect good girl. It's edgy to be a little rebellious.
author: Behati Prinsloo

quote: Law is nothing other than a certain ordinance of reason for the common good, promulgated by the person who has the care of the community.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: Life is good when we think it's good. Life is bad when we don't think.
author: Douglas Horton

quote: All I can tell you really is if you get to the point where someone is telling you that you are not great or not good enough, just follow your heart and don't let anybody crush your dream.
author: Patti LaBelle

quote: Serenity is knowing that your worst shot is still pretty good.
author: Johnny Miller

quote: Charity bestowed upon those who are worthy of it is like good seed sown on a good soil that yields an abundance of fruits. But alms given to those who are yet under the tyrannical yoke of the passions are like seed deposited in a bad soil. The passions of the receiver of the alms choke, as it were, the growth of merits.
author: Buddha

quote: Looking good is the best revenge.
author: Ivana Trump

quote: You never realize what a good memory you have until you try to forget something.
author: Franklin P. Jones

quote: My advice to anybody, including myself, is if you're going through a bad period, and you just can't see the world's on your shoulders and no day is a good day, you're missing the whole point of the experience. And that's something dogs know from the moment they come bounding up to you as a puppy.
author: W. Bruce Cameron

quote: Every job is good if you do your best and work hard. A man who works hard stinks only to the ones that have nothing to do but smell.
author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quote: Manners are a sensitive awareness of the feelings of others. If you have that awareness, you have good manners, no matter what fork you use.
author: Emily Post

quote: I really don't think in the past. I sit down with many friends at dinner, and they like to talk about the good old days. I'm respectful of the good old days, but I find myself spending very little time reminiscing. I'm really looking forward.
author: Donald Bren

quote: The most important thing, in anything you do, is always trying your hardest, because even if you try your hardest and it's not as good as you'd hoped, you still have that sense of not letting yourself down.
author: Tom Holland

quote: Great artists make the roads; good teachers and good companions can point them out. But there ain't no free rides, baby.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: I think it matters whether someone has a good heart.
author: Elon Musk

quote: I gave up my struggle with perfection a long time ago. That is a concept I don't find very interesting anymore. Everyone just wants to look good in the photographs. I think that is where some of the pressure comes from. Be happy. Be yourself, the day is about a lot more.
author: Anne Hathaway

quote: A good character is the best tombstone. Those who loved you and were helped by you will remember you when forget-me-nots have withered. Carve your name on hearts, not on marble.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: A film is never really good unless the camera is an eye in the head of a poet.
author: Orson Welles

quote: To be a good actor you have to be something like a criminal, to be willing to break the rules to strive for something new.
author: Nicolas Cage

quote: I feel like our culture is so good at pulling other people down and being so judgmental, but there's space for all of us to be who we are. There's space for us to celebrate each other and root for each other and not take each other down.
author: Tracee Ellis Ross

quote: The message is that I was reminding myself and informing others of the fact that God has always been good to me. No matter what you're going through, God is always with us. Life is a journey.
author: Andrae Crouch

quote: Hatred is gained as much by good works as by evil.
author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: True intuitive expertise is learned from prolonged experience with good feedback on mistakes.
author: Daniel Kahneman

quote: Mondays are a good day to make statements, not Friday.
author: Ernie Els

quote: Every man, every woman who has to take up the service of government, must ask themselves two questions: 'Do I love my people in order to serve them better? Am I humble and do I listen to everybody, to diverse opinions in order to choose the best path?' If you don't ask those questions, your governance will not be good.
author: Pope Francis

quote: Good writing is supposed to evoke sensation in the reader - not the fact that it is raining, but the feeling of being rained upon.
author: E. L. Doctorow

quote: Fishing provides that connection with the whole living world. It gives you the opportunity of being totally immersed, turning back into yourself in a good way. A form of meditation, some form of communion with levels of yourself that are deeper than the ordinary self.
author: Ted Hughes

quote: It doesn't matter how many A-levels you have, what kind of a degree you have, if you have good manners, people will like you.
author: Kate Reardon

quote: Fame itself... doesn't really afford you anything more than a good seat in a restaurant.
author: David Bowie

quote: A good school teaches you resilience - that ability to bounce back.
author: Kate Reardon

quote: It's good to feel stupid sometimes and do things that are out of your comfort zone.
author: Mary-Louise Parker

quote: A man who was completely innocent, offered himself as a sacrifice for the good of others, including his enemies, and became the ransom of the world. It was a perfect act.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: I was walking along and this chair came flying past me, and another, and another, and I thought, man, is this gonna be a good night.
author: Liam Gallagher

quote: Each man is good in His sight. It is not necessary for eagles to be crows.
author: Sitting Bull

quote: For a real New India to arise, all petty and small things must be given up. To be redeemed, all Indians must offer to sacrifice not only their good things, but all those evil things they cling to blindly - their hates and their divisions, their pride in what they should be thoroughly ashamed of, their quarrels and misunderstandings.
author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quote: Our brand of democracy is hard. But I can promise that a year from now, when I no longer hold this office, I'll be right there with you as a citizen - inspired by those voices of fairness and vision, of grit and good humor and kindness that have helped America travel so far.
author: Barack Obama

quote: No matter how good a driver you are, you have to have the right car and the right team behind you in order to succeed.
author: Nico Rosberg

quote: What is the good of your stars and trees, your sunrise and the wind, if they do not enter into our daily lives?
author: E. M. Forster

quote: Good humor is a tonic for mind and body. It is the best antidote for anxiety and depression. It is a business asset. It attracts and keeps friends. It lightens human burdens. It is the direct route to serenity and contentment.
author: Grenville Kleiser

quote: When you adopt a dog, you have a lot of very good days and one very bad day.
author: W. Bruce Cameron

quote: The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid.
author: Jane Austen

quote: Being a teen can be tough. Just try to surround yourself with really good friends that really have your back, and also be a really good friend to those who really care about you. If you're not sure about certain things, talk to your friends that you trust and your family.
author: Victoria Justice

quote: When government - in pursuit of good intentions - tries to rearrange the economy, legislate morality, or help special interests, the cost come in inefficiency, lack of motivation, and loss of freedom. Government should be a referee, not an active player.
author: Milton Friedman

quote: The sad truth is that most evil is done by people who never make up their minds to be good or evil.
author: Hannah Arendt

quote: Nothing is more responsible for the good old days than a bad memory.
author: Franklin Pierce Adams

quote: Part of doing good work is caring deeply about it, believing in what you're doing, and getting incredibly attached to the characters that you're playing, the stories you're telling, and the people you're working with.
author: Ari Graynor

quote: Most good programmers do programming not because they expect to get paid or get adulation by the public, but because it is fun to program.
author: Linus Torvalds

quote: When people see your personality come out, they feel so good, like they actually know who you are.
author: Usain Bolt

quote: Trust the young people; trust this generation's innovation. They're making things, changing innovation every day. And all the consumers are the same: they want new things, they want cheap things, they want good things, they want unique things. If we can create these kind of things for consumers, they will come.
author: Jack Ma

quote: A captain of the Navy ought to be a man of strong and well connected sense, with a tolerable good education, a gentleman, as well as a seaman both in theory and practice.
author: John Paul Jones

quote: Those who decide to use leisure as a means of mental development, who love good music, good books, good pictures, good plays, good company, good conversation - what are they? They are the happiest people in the world.
author: William Lyon Phelps

quote: Positive thinking is the notion that if you think good thoughts, things will work out well. Optimism is the feeling of thinking things will be well and be hopeful.
author: Martin Seligman

quote: What happens when good people are put into an evil place? Do they triumph or does the situation dominate their past history and morality?
author: Philip Zimbardo

quote: A liar should have a good memory.
author: Quintilian

quote: Well, there's nothing better than putting your feet up on a Sunday afternoon and grabbing a good book.
author: Chris Klein

quote: You should feel good about making your home nicer for your family and your friends. You should feel great about cooking a good dinner and making a dress for a granddaughter, creating a beautiful birthday party. It's all part of life.
author: Martha Stewart

quote: People change over the years, and that changes situations for good and for bad.
author: Bobby Knight

quote: I hope people remember me as a good and decent man. And if they do, then that's success.
author: Tim Cook

quote: I've had long hair, I've had short hair, and I've had in between hair... and its all good.
author: Morena Baccarin

quote: The secret of a good life is to have the right loyalties and hold them in the right scale of values.
author: Norman Thomas

quote: Self-confidence has always been one of my good qualities. I am always very confident. It is in my nature to be confident, to be aggressive. And it applies in my batting as well as wicketkeeping.
author: Mahendra Singh Dhoni

quote: I don't know about happy endings, because I don't think, eventually, anything is happy. You feel a bout of happiness with good news. Five minutes later, there could be a traffic jam or a phone call from an irritating relative or a weird thought, or it could be a tweet that annoys you, and your emotion will flip immediately.
author: Karan Johar

quote: We need Hawaii just as much and a good deal more than we did California. It is Manifest Destiny.
author: William McKinley

quote: Listen; there's a hell of a good universe next door: let's go.
author: e. e. cummings

quote: What greater bliss than to look back on days spent in usefulness, in doing good to those around us.
author: Dorothea Dix

quote: A good puzzle, it's a fair thing. Nobody is lying. It's very clear, and the problem depends just on you.
author: Erno Rubik

quote: I suppose being fierce is a very good thing, and a very cool thing. But more than fierce, I think I'm a strong person and a strong individual. And that's what I take with me every day.
author: Johnny Weir

quote: The last time I saw Ted Kennedy was a generation after my first meeting, at the Senate subway below the Capitol on Obama's Inauguration Day. He was his usual gregarious and gracious self - with beaming smile and booming voice wishing my husband and me good luck with our pregnancy and expressing his excitement about the new president.
author: Christine Pelosi

quote: It's always better to shock people and change people's expectations than to give them exactly what they think you can do. It's not unexpected for me to be in a comedy film anymore; I'm no longer the underdog in that world. Not that I'm great or good at it or anything, it's just that I've done a bunch of them, so you're not shocked.
author: Jonah Hill

quote: The good and the wise lead quiet lives.
author: Euripides

quote: Hope is a good breakfast, but it is a bad supper.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: It's a long journey. There will be good times, and there will be bad times, but SoftBank is always there.
author: Masayoshi Son

quote: Academic achievement was something I'd always sought as a form of reward. Good grades pleased my parents, good grades pleased my teachers; you got them in order to sew up approval.
author: Caroline Knapp

quote: Of all that is good, sublimity is supreme. Succeeding is the coming together of all that is beautiful. Furtherance is the agreement of all that is just. Perseverance is the foundation of all actions.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Whatever your situation might be, set your mind to whatever you want to do and put a good attitude in it, and I believe that you can succeed. You are not going to get anywhere just sitting on your butt and moping around.
author: Bethany Hamilton

quote: Not many people have had as much bad luck as I have, but not many people have had as much good luck, either.
author: Tig Notaro

quote: Intelligence is not to make no mistakes, but quickly to see how to make them good.
author: Bertolt Brecht

quote: I'm a good man, and I'm gonna become a better man.
author: Chance The Rapper

quote: All good things which exist are the fruits of originality.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: A good job is more than just a paycheck. A good job fosters independence and discipline, and contributes to the health of the community. A good job is a means to provide for the health and welfare of your family, to own a home, and save for retirement.
author: James H. Douglas, Jr.

quote: I'm very careful about how I portray violence in my films. I do believe that violence, especially violent video games, are not a good thing for young kids.
author: Spike Lee

quote: Evil is a source of moral intelligence in the sense that we need to learn from our shadow, from our dark side, in order to be good.
author: John Bradshaw

quote: There is no such thing as bad weather, only different kinds of good weather.
author: John Ruskin

quote: There is only one difference between a long life and a good dinner: that, in the dinner, the sweets come last.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: The evil that men do lives after them; the good is oft interred with their bones.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: The most important thing is to read as much as you can, like I did. It will give you an understanding of what makes good writing and it will enlarge your vocabulary.
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: I'm a hacker, but I'm the good kind of hackers. And I've never been a criminal.
author: Mikko Hypponen

quote: If people are good only because they fear punishment, and hope for reward, then we are a sorry lot indeed.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I wouldn't ever say if you're having tough times then there must be something wrong with you or your attitude. Life's a fight. It's a good fight of faith. I encourage people to stay up, stay hopeful, stay faith-filled.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: I am looking for strong characters rather than being just a pretty girl. Actresses can do so much more than looking good.
author: Disha Patani

quote: On a day when you're tired, it's important to just say good morning to everyone so they're kind of aware that it's gonna be a good day. Jamie Lee Curtis told me that.
author: Lindsay Lohan

quote: Chemistry can be a good and bad thing. Chemistry is good when you make love with it. Chemistry is bad when you make crack with it.
author: Adam Sandler

quote: The things that make me happiest in the whole world are going on the occasional picnic, either with my children or with my partner; big family gatherings; and being able to go to the grocery store - if I can get those things in, I'm doing good.
author: Kate Winslet

quote: Set your sights high, the higher the better. Expect the most wonderful things to happen, not in the future but right now. Realize that nothing is too good. Allow absolutely nothing to hamper you or hold you up in any way.
author: Eileen Caddy

quote: The more tranquil a man becomes, the greater is his success, his influence, his power for good. Calmness of mind is one of the beautiful jewels of wisdom.
author: James Allen

quote: I am a bit difficult to be around sometimes. I can be stubborn on a lot of things, and I'm set, but I can also adapt in a conflict situation and don't hold on to an ego. I end up seeing the larger good and adapt to it, provided it benefits me. I may come across as a cold person, but I am extremely sentimental.
author: Emraan Hashmi

quote: Well, real estate is always good, as far as I'm concerned.
author: Donald Trump

quote: The idea of redemption is always good news, even if it means sacrifice or some difficult times.
author: Patti Smith

quote: It's always good to be underestimated.
author: Donald Trump

quote: Leadership consists of picking good men and helping them do their best.
author: Chester W. Nimitz

quote: No evil can happen to a good man, either in life or after death.
author: Plato

quote: Don't get me wrong, I'm very good, I'm a loyal person and I would never treat anyone badly - what goes around comes around. But I do go for the bad boy. I haven't outgrown that.
author: Kierston Wareing

quote: What a newspaper needs in its news, in its headlines, and on its editorial page is terseness, humor, descriptive power, satire, originality, good literary style, clever condensation, and accuracy, accuracy, accuracy!
author: Joseph Pulitzer

quote: I did the best I could, and in some arenas, my best was not good enough. I've made some bad choices.
author: Amy Grant

quote: When I'm good, I'm very good. But when I'm bad I'm better.
author: Mae West

quote: I like Aurora, 'Sleeping Beauty,' because she's just sleeping and looking pretty and waiting for boys to come kiss her. Sounds like a good life - lots of naps and cute boys fighting dragons to come kiss you.
author: Ariana Grande

quote: Every mother and daughter should make time for a trip together. It's good for the soul.
author: Anne Robinson

quote: People tend to dwell more on negative things than on good things. So the mind then becomes obsessed with negative things, with judgments, guilt and anxiety produced by thoughts about the future and so on.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Fashion is about comfort and feeling good.
author: Max Azria

quote: My definition of a good hotel is a place I'd stay at.
author: Robert De Niro

quote: It takes a lot of imagination to be a good photographer. You need less imagination to be a painter because you can invent things. But in photography everything is so ordinary; it takes a lot of looking before you learn to see the extraordinary.
author: David Bailey

quote: Resilience is accepting your new reality, even if it's less good than the one you had before.
author: Elizabeth Edwards

quote: When people say, you know, 'Good teacher,' 'Prophet,' 'Really nice guy'... this is not how Jesus thought of Himself. So you're left with a challenge in that, which is either Jesus was who he said he was or a complete and utter nut case. You have to make a choice on that.
author: Bono

quote: Joy is what happens to us when we allow ourselves to recognize how good things really are.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: You have young men of color in many communities who are more likely to end up in jail or in the criminal justice system than they are in a good job or in college. And, you know, part of my job, that I can do, I think, without any potential conflicts, is to get at those root causes.
author: Barack Obama

quote: They didn't want it good, they wanted it Wednesday.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: The power of choosing good and evil is within the reach of all.
author: Origen

quote: I think you have to be cool to be a good flirt, and I don't think I'm very cool.
author: Harry Styles

quote: I think a good friend, to me, is all about trust and loyalty. You don't ever want to second-guess whether you can tell your friend something.
author: Lauren Conrad

quote: Our population and our use of the finite resources of planet Earth are growing exponentially, along with our technical ability to change the environment for good or ill.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Self-awareness is the ability to take an honest look at your life without any attachment to it being right or wrong, good or bad.
author: Debbie Ford

quote: After May 1940, the good times were few and far between; first there was the war, then the capitulation, and then the arrival of the Germans, which is when the trouble started for the Jews.
author: Anne Frank

quote: Fun is good.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: To me, the Seventies were very inspirational and very influential... With my whole persona as Snoop Dogg, as a person, as a rapper. I just love the Seventies style, the way all the players dressed nice, you know, kept their hair looking good, drove sharp cars and they talked real slick.
author: Snoop Dogg

quote: Social media has come a long way. With the good has come some bad, and you always have a lot of people hiding behind their computers and being very critical of what you do on and off the field, of what you tweet, of what you say, of everything you do.
author: Alex Morgan

quote: I tell people that life is like a book. Sometimes you've just got to turn the chapter. Even if you don't understand it, turn the chapter and move away from it. You don't know all the good things that are ahead of you yet.
author: Danny Gokey

quote: If anything is good for pounding humility into you permanently, it's the restaurant business.
author: Anthony Bourdain

quote: My mom was a model, so she's been really good about giving me tips on how to navigate behind the scenes - like the importance of being nice to everyone on set and remembering people's names, to how to be a positive part of the photo shoot and stuff like that.
author: Gigi Hadid

quote: A good plan today is better than a perfect plan tomorrow. Don't wait for an inspired ending to come to mind. Work your way to the ending and see what comes up.
author: Andy Weir

quote: I think fear is what keeps us from going over the edge. I mean, as a race car driver, I don't think what makes a good race car driver is a fearless person. I think it's somebody that is comfortable being behind the wheel of something that's somewhat out of control.
author: Jeff Gordon

quote: Scoutcraft is a means through which the veriest hooligan can be brought to higher thought and to the elements of faith in God; and, coupled with the Scout's obligation to do a good turn every day, it gives the base of Duty to God and to Neighbour on which the parent or pastor can build with greater ease the form of belief that is desired.
author: Robert Baden-Powell

quote: Losing a Super Bowl destroys all the good things that happened to get you there.
author: Don Shula

quote: Luxury is anything you don't need, right? I mean, you need food, water, clothing, shelter... but good wine, good food, beautiful interiors, nice clothes; those aren't necessities, they are luxuries - it's all luxury.
author: Marc Jacobs

quote: I was never a pretty girl, so I wasn't the one to get the boy. I used to cast myself as a good sport. Sometimes I wonder if I do that too much with roles I play, because if I'm absolutely truthful, I quite like being the best friend, or the supporting role, and actually I ought to gear-change and make myself the leading role.
author: Celia Imrie

quote: We struggle with eating healthily, obesity, and access to good nutrition for everyone. But we have a great opportunity to get on the right side of this battle by beginning to think differently about the way that we eat and the way that we approach food.
author: Marcus Samuelsson

quote: A good wife always forgives her husband when she's wrong.
author: Milton Berle

quote: If you are feeling good, you look good, you are confident about yourself, you are going to go out there, and you will rock it.
author: Michelle Carter

quote: Teamwork is so important that it is virtually impossible for you to reach the heights of your capabilities or make the money that you want without becoming very good at it.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: How great are the dangers I face to win a good name in Athens.
author: Alexander the Great

quote: The way the world is, I think a silly evening in the theatre is a good thing, to take our minds off terror.
author: Tim Curry

quote: Personal relationships are always the key to good business. You can buy networking; you can't buy friendships.
author: Lindsay Fox

quote: It's good to test yourself and develop your talents and ambitions as fully as you can and achieve greater success; but I think success is the feeling you get from a job well done, and the key thing is to do the work.
author: Peter Thiel

quote: But the real secret to lifelong good health is actually the opposite: Let your body take care of you.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Good guy' or 'bad guy', hero or anti hero; doesn't matter to me, what role I play, only the character have something magical.
author: Rutger Hauer

quote: Hearty laughter is a good way to jog internally without having to go outdoors.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: There is a fine line between censorship and good taste and moral responsibility.
author: Steven Spielberg

quote: Conflict is good in a negotiation process... it's the clash of two ideas, which then, all being well, produces a third idea.
author: Luke Roberts

quote: I can live for two months on a good compliment.
author: Mark Twain

quote: For evil to flourish, it only requires good men to do nothing.
author: Simon Wiesenthal

quote: A return to first principles in a republic is sometimes caused by the simple virtues of one man. His good example has such an influence that the good men strive to imitate him, and the wicked are ashamed to lead a life so contrary to his example.
author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: Be yourself, fill your life with good people, and don't get a big head. It can all be gone tomorrow.
author: Molly Sims

quote: I am for doing good to the poor, but I differ in opinion about the means. I think the best way of doing good to the poor is not making them easy in poverty, but leading or driving them out of it.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The three touchstones that woke Buddha up - sickness, old age, and death - are a pretty good place to start when crafting a tragic tale. And if we need to get more specific: heartbreak, destruction, miscomprehension, natural disasters, betrayal, and the waste of human potential.
author: Paul Di Filippo

quote: Laughter is the sensation of feeling good all over and showing it principally in one place.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Automation is good, so long as you know exactly where to put the machine.
author: Eliyahu Goldratt

quote: Even the dullest bird or face becomes interesting when you give it a good look in the wild/flesh. The way the shadow drops across the cheek, the light hits an eyebrow, etc... there are many more angles, positions etc. than you can ever imagine. My heart always makes a little jump when I see things in birds or faces that surprise me.
author: Siegfried Woldhek

quote: Capitalism does a number of things very well: it helps create an entrepreneurial spirit; it gets people motivated to come up with new ideas, and that's a good thing.
author: Bernie Sanders

quote: About morals, I know only that what is moral is what you feel good after and what is immoral is what you feel bad after.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: I could talk food all day. I love good food.
author: Tom Brady

quote: I try to keep in my mind the simple question: Am I trying to do good or make myself look good? Too many of our responsibilities get added to our plate when we are trying to please people, impress people, prove ourselves, acquire power, increase our prestige. All those motivations are about looking good more than doing good.
author: Kevin DeYoung

quote: Baseball is the only field of endeavor where a man can succeed three times out of ten and be considered a good performer.
author: Ted Williams

quote: Do you want to be safe and good, or do you want to take a chance and be great?
author: Jimmy Johnson

quote: Dishonesty is all about the small acts we can take and then think, 'No, this not real cheating.' So if you think that the main mechanism is rationalization, then what you come up with, and that's what we find, is that we're basically trying to balance feeling good about ourselves.
author: Dan Ariely

quote: Good leaders must communicate vision clearly, creatively, and continually. However, the vision doesn't come alive until the leader models it.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Confidence. If you have it, you can make anything look good.
author: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: Nothing tastes as good as skinny feels.
author: Kate Moss

quote: The speed of decision making is the essence of good governance.
author: Piyush Goyal

quote: A good leader doesn't get stuck behind a desk.
author: Richard Branson

quote: A good movie makes the audience feel like they've journeyed with the characters.
author: Rich Moore

quote: There is undoubtedly a lot of pressure that comes with recognition, which can be a good thing and bad thing all at the same time. But if you stay focused and don't lose sight of what you're doing and who you are, you can rise above it.
author: Prabal Gurung

quote: Conservation means the wise use of the earth and its resources for the lasting good of men.
author: Gifford Pinchot

quote: It's the easiest thing in the world to be down about anything. I think the body responds to good vibes.
author: Dave Davies

quote: Growing up, I had only one good pair of shoes. So on rainy school days, my mom would slip plastic bread bags over them to keep them dry. But I was never embarrassed. Because the school bus would be filled with rows and rows of young Iowans with bread bags slipped over their feet.
author: Joni Ernst

quote: Fighting for one's freedom, struggling towards being free, is like struggling to be a poet or a good Christian or a good Jew or a good Muslim or good Zen Buddhist. You work all day long and achieve some kind of level of success by nightfall, go to sleep and wake up the next morning with the job still to be done. So you start all over again.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The League is very well when sparrows shout, but no good at all when eagles fall out.
author: Benito Mussolini

quote: If there is such a thing as good leadership, it is to give a good example. I have to do so for all the Ikea employees.
author: Ingvar Kamprad

quote: Good things do not come easy. The road is lined with pitfalls.
author: Desi Arnaz

quote: We cannot make good news out of bad practice.
author: Edward R. Murrow

quote: In my long innings, I have seen many sunrises and many sunsets; many good and bad times.
author: Sharad Pawar

quote: All human beings are commingled out of good and evil.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: In tragedy, it's hard to find a good resolution; it's not black and white: it's a big fog of gray.
author: Paul Dano

quote: I would like to be remembered as a man who had a wonderful time living life, a man who had good friends, fine family - and I don't think I could ask for anything more than that, actually.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: When you do something, you should burn yourself up completely, like a good bonfire, leaving no trace of yourself.
author: Shunryu Suzuki

quote: I like to think I'm a pretty good friend. I love having a good time, and I enjoy being able to share those good times with others.
author: Jacob Batalon

quote: Good, bad or indifferent, if you are not investing in new technology, you are going to be left behind.
author: Philip Green

quote: How long you can continue to be good at something is how much you believe in yourself and how much hard work you do with the training.
author: Jason Statham

quote: I'm still not aware that I'm good looking.
author: Jamie Dornan

quote: Jealousy is both reasonable and belongs to reasonable men, while envy is base and belongs to the base, for the one makes himself get good things by jealousy, while the other does not allow his neighbour to have them through envy.
author: Aristotle

quote: You're going to struggle. You're going to do well. You can't really let the past or the day before - whether you had a good day or bad day - dictate the day you have that certain day.
author: Andrew Benintendi

quote: There are three kinds of intelligence: one kind understands things for itself, the other appreciates what others can understand, the third understands neither for itself nor through others. This first kind is excellent, the second good, and the third kind useless.
author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: No blessing, no good, can follow in the path trodden by slavery.
author: Dorothea Dix

quote: Being funny is one of my greatest strengths. I can make girls smile when they're down, and when they're having a good time, I can carry on the joke.
author: John Krasinski

quote: I don't care what anyone says. Being rich is a good thing.
author: Mark Cuban

quote: No matter what has happened to you in the past or what is going on in your life right now, it has no power to keep you from having an amazingly good future if you will walk by faith in God. God loves you! He wants you to live with victory over sin so you can possess His promises for your life today!
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: If there's one thing I'm good at, it's gathering people together to do something fun.
author: Dave Grohl

quote: Good leaders organize and align people around what the team needs to do. Great leaders motivate and inspire people with why they're doing it. That's purpose. And that's the key to achieving something truly transformational.
author: Marillyn Hewson

quote: The good life consists in deriving happiness by using your signature strengths every day in the main realms of living. The meaningful life adds one more component: using these same strengths to forward knowledge, power or goodness.
author: Martin Seligman

quote: The funny thing is, I'm so used to not caring what anyone says, good or bad, that unfortunately even when people say good things... I wish it made me feel good, but it doesn't.
author: Rob Zombie

quote: Thinking good thoughts is not enough, doing good deeds is not enough, seeing others follow your good examples is enough.
author: Douglas Horton

quote: You can't take good health for granted.
author: Jack Osbourne

quote: Good planning is important. I've also regarded a sense of humor as one of the most important things on a big expedition. When you're in a difficult or dangerous situation, or when you're depressed about the chances of success, someone who can make you laugh eases the tension.
author: Edmund Hillary

quote: We should seek by all means in our power to avoid war, by analysing possible causes, by trying to remove them, by discussion in a spirit of collaboration and good will.
author: Neville Chamberlain

quote: Your problem is how you are going to spend this one odd and precious life you have been issued. Whether you're going to spend it trying to look good and creating the illusion that you have power over people and circumstances, or whether you are going to taste it, enjoy it and find out the truth about who you are.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: The good we secure for ourselves is precarious and uncertain until it is secured for all of us and incorporated into our common life.
author: Jane Addams

quote: Non-cooperation with evil is as much a duty as is cooperation with good.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: It usually takes me more than three weeks to prepare a good impromptu speech.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I got different moods. Like, if I'm in a good mood, I listen to 'Up' by Thug. If I'm not in a good mood, I'll listen to 'King TROUP' - that's a real emotional one.
author: Lil Uzi Vert

quote: Immortality is to live your life doing good things, and leaving your mark behind.
author: Brandon Lee

quote: Aim above morality. Be not simply good, be good for something.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I'm not a Starbucks guy. I'm a Dunkin Donuts guy, but I like to pay for the coffee of the other folks behind me in line. It typically costs me less than $10, and makes the other people feel good, but more importantly, it makes me feel so good, and random acts of kindness change the world one person at a time.
author: Robert Kraft

quote: Few things are harder to put up with than the annoyance of a good example.
author: Mark Twain

quote: You can't get much done in life if you only work on the days when you feel good.
author: Jerry West

quote: The good old days are now.
author: Tom Clancy

quote: Too few people understand a really good sandwich.
author: James Beard

quote: There were times that I thought I was good looking.
author: Leonard Cohen

quote: The highest reward that God gives us for good work is the ability to do better work.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: There's many a bestseller that could have been prevented by a good teacher.
author: Flannery O'Connor

quote: Old things are always in good repute, present things in disfavor.
author: Tacitus

quote: Desperation is like stealing from the Mafia: you stand a good chance of attracting the wrong attention.
author: Douglas Horton

quote: I think sometimes in life we want to ignore the problems of society and just think about the good. I believe in positive thinking and affirmative living, I also think it's really important to remember all of our disenfranchised members of society.
author: Kerry Washington

quote: He who stops being better stops being good.
author: Oliver Cromwell

quote: You can't please everyone, and you have to trust your instincts, and you have to do your work and throw yourself in there and trust your instincts, and just trust that you're doing a good job that I can be proud of as well.
author: Matt Ryan

quote: People's character is their behaviour - we're all capable of good and evil.
author: Bertie Carvel

quote: Make up your mind to act decidedly and take the consequences. No good is ever done in this world by hesitation.
author: Thomas Huxley

quote: In every age 'the good old days' were a myth. No one ever thought they were good at the time. For every age has consisted of crises that seemed intolerable to the people who lived through them.
author: Brooks Atkinson

quote: If it doesn't taste good it doesn't go on the menu.
author: Heston Blumenthal

quote: If there is dissatisfaction with the status quo, good. If there is ferment, so much the better. If there is restlessness, I am pleased. Then let there be ideas, and hard thought, and hard work. If man feels small, let man make himself bigger.
author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quote: A good beginning makes a good end.
author: Louis L'Amour

quote: If you go to work on your goals, your goals will go to work on you. If you go to work on your plan, your plan will go to work on you. Whatever good things we build end up building us.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: In art the best is good enough.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: My dream is to live a good life and be loving, be close to God and be a good human being and bring peace to people.
author: Ziggy Marley

quote: Surround yourself with good people. People who are going to be honest with you and look out for your best interests.
author: Derek Jeter

quote: Don't try to be different. Just be good. To be good is different enough.
author: Arthur Freed

quote: It takes more than just a good looking body. You've got to have the heart and soul to go with it.
author: Lee Haney

quote: Apart from education, you need good health, and for that, you need to play sports.
author: Kapil Dev

quote: I believe, I believe every day is a good day when you paint.
author: Bob Ross

quote: Happiness: a good bank account, a good cook, and a good digestion.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: I'm a good girl because I really believe in love, integrity, and respect. I'm a bad girl because I like to tease.
author: Katy Perry

quote: Bad people are, from the point of view of art, fascinating studies. They represent colour, variety and strangeness. Good people exasperate one's reason; bad people stir one's imagination.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I try to keep in mind that it's a long journey. It's not a race. It's about staying focused, continuing to do good work, make my family and community proud; that's all I really want to do... and pay my bills.
author: Gina Rodriguez

quote: The way to be successful in the software world is to come up with breakthrough software, and so whether it's Microsoft Office or Windows, its pushing that forward. New ideas, surprising the marketplace, so good engineering and good business are one in the same.
author: Bill Gates

quote: One that confounds good and evil is an enemy to good.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: Life consists not in holding good cards but in playing those you hold well.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Happiness is good health and a bad memory.
author: Ingrid Bergman

quote: Don't get me wrong: school is good and all, but school is way too slow for me. Like, super slow. So I didn't want to go. I wanted to learn on my own with real life experiences.
author: Lil Uzi Vert

quote: I have a dream of re-creating the fantastic family I grew up in with my brother and my parents. I am lucky that I have such a good image of family life - my father and mother are still in love, still happy.
author: Caterina Murino

quote: Looks is a matter of perception. At Cannes, Europeans think I am good looking, while in India, I am not.
author: Nawazuddin Siddiqui

quote: A man has to live with himself, and he should see to it that he always has good company.
author: Charles Evans Hughes

quote: I am glad that I paid so little attention to good advice; had I abided by it I might have been saved from some of my most valuable mistakes.
author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quote: Actors are the best and the worst of people. They're like kids. When they're good, they're very very good. When they're bad they're very very naughty.
author: Kenneth Branagh

quote: Not only must we be good, but we must also be good for something.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Writing is good, thinking is better. Cleverness is good, patience is better.
author: Herman Hesse

quote: A good scare is worth more to a man than good advice.
author: E. W. Howe

quote: It is better to be beautiful than to be good. But... it is better to be good than to be ugly.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Good food and a warm kitchen are what makes a house a home. I always tried to make my home like my mother's, because Mom was magnificent at stretching a buck when it came to decorating and food. Like a true Italian, she valued beautification in every area of her life, and I try to do the same.
author: Rachael Ray

quote: Of all tyrannies a tyranny sincerely exercised for the good of its victims may be the most oppressive.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: What I miss the most is chatting with my friends and family and having a good laugh over a simple meal.
author: Kim Yuna

quote: I want to see how far I can go and how good I can be, whether it's in the classroom or on the football field.
author: Eric Berry

quote: My philosophy of leadership is to surround myself with good people who have ability, judgment and knowledge, but above all, a passion for service.
author: Sonny Perdue

quote: The greatest good you can do for another is not just to share your riches but to reveal to him his own.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: I object to violence because when it appears to do good, the good is only temporary; the evil it does is permanent.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Show me a good loser, and I'll show you a loser.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Filming is a funny combination of having a good time and not being able to wait until it's over.
author: Nicole Holofcener

quote: I always said that if I could just find a guy who could chop wood and had a nice smile, it wouldn't bother me if he was a thug or an aristocrat, as long as he was a good guy. And I've ended up with an educated thug.
author: Sade Adu

quote: The thing with pretending you're in a good mood is that sometimes you can.
author: Charles de Lint
