quote: I think young generation is always better than last generation. No matter you like it or don't like it. My father said, 'Jack, I'm so good, you'll never be' - but I'm better than him. My father is better than my grandfather. My children will be better than us.
author: Jack Ma

quote: It is good to realize that if love and peace can prevail on earth, and if we can teach our children to honor nature's gifts, the joys and beauties of the outdoors will be here forever.
author: Jimmy Carter

quote: Music is made one of Satan's most attractive agencies to ensnare souls; but, when turned to a good account, it is a blessing. When abused, it leads the unconsecrated to pride, vanity, and folly.
author: Ellen G. White

quote: Cleanliness is a good thing, which the society should embrace. But it has nothing to do with Modi, nor can he implement it.
author: Kapil Sibal

quote: In religious and in secular affairs, the more fervent beliefs attract followers. If you are a moderate in any respect - if you're a moderate on abortion, if you're a moderate on gun control, or if you're a moderate in your religious faith - it doesn't evolve into a crusade where you're either right or wrong, good or bad, with us or against us.
author: Jimmy Carter

quote: You cannot hold on to anything good. You must be continually giving - and getting. You cannot hold on to your seed. You must sow it - and reap anew. You cannot hold on to riches. You must use them and get other riches in return.
author: Robert Collier

quote: An armed society is a polite society. Manners are good when one may have to back up his acts with his life.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: The E.U.'s tax and regulatory policies, climate-change and welfare spending, and free immigration even in wartime are gradually ruining Europe. That's why I believe Brexit is good for British freedom, political autonomy, and the survival of democratic capitalism.
author: Lawrence Kudlow

quote: What the people want is very simple - they want an America as good as its promise.
author: Barbara Jordan

quote: A heart well prepared for adversity in bad times hopes, and in good times fears for a change in fortune.
author: Horace

quote: I just cash in on the fact that I'm good looking, and I've got a nice figure and girls like me.
author: Sid Vicious

quote: Nobody minds having what is too good for them.
author: Jane Austen

quote: Doing well is the result of doing good. That's what capitalism is all about.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Confidence in the goodness of another is good proof of one's own goodness.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: It's good to shut up sometimes.
author: Marcel Marceau

quote: The omission of good is no less reprehensible than the commission of evil.
author: Plutarch

quote: Learn to... be what you are, and learn to resign with a good grace all that you are not.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: What a miserable thing life is: you're living in clover, only the clover isn't good enough.
author: Bertolt Brecht

quote: There has to be evil so that good can prove its purity above it.
author: Unknown

quote: Good men are the stars, the planets of the ages wherein they live, and illustrate the times.
author: Ben Jonson

quote: I have made good judgments in the past. I have made good judgments in the future.
author: Dan Quayle

quote: Bad news travels at the speed of light; good news travels like molasses.
author: Tracy Morgan

quote: He who can no longer pause to wonder and stand rapt in awe, is as good as dead; his eyes are closed.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: A man is called selfish not for pursuing his own good, but for neglecting his neighbor's.
author: Richard Whately

quote: We're all moving at such a high rate that we have to grab the frozen dinners and the McDonald's. We can't make it a way of life - we have to get back to real, simple, clean good foods. It will save our lives on so many levels; not just spina bifida, but obesity, diabetes, everything. Food is our medicine.
author: Nicole Ari Parker

quote: The chief enemy of creativity is 'good' sense.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Keep good company - that is, go to the Louvre.
author: Paul Cezanne

quote: Less is only more where more is no good.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Better is the enemy of good.
author: Voltaire

quote: On the whole, human beings want to be good, but not too good, and not quite all the time.
author: George Orwell

quote: In reality, those rare few cases with good forensic evidence are the ones that make it to court.
author: Pat Brown

quote: Be not simply good - be good for something.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The less we deserve good fortune, the more we hope for it.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: A man who is good enough to shed his blood for the country is good enough to be given a square deal afterwards.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Only the young die good.
author: Oliver Herford

quote: Like every other good thing in this world, leisure and culture have to be paid for. Fortunately, however, it is not the leisured and the cultured who have to pay.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: The word 'good' has many meanings. For example, if a man were to shoot his grandmother at a range of five hundred yards, I should call him a good shot, but not necessarily a good man.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Too much of a good thing can be taxing.
author: Mae West

quote: A man is as good as he has to be, and a woman as bad as she dares.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: No man deserves to be praised for his goodness, who has it not in his power to be wicked. Goodness without that power is generally nothing more than sloth, or an impotence of will.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Good leaders make people feel that they're at the very heart of things, not at the periphery.
author: Warren Bennis

quote: They're only truly great who are truly good.
author: George Chapman

quote: It is not good to be too free. It is not good to have everything one wants.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: An inexhaustible good nature is one of the most precious gifts of heaven, spreading itself like oil over the troubled sea of thought, and keeping the mind smooth and equable in the roughest weather.
author: Washington Irving

quote: Evil and good are God's right hand and left.
author: Horace Mann

quote: No man or woman can be strong, gentle, pure, and good, without the world being better for it and without someone being helped and comforted by the very existence of that goodness.
author: Phillips Brooks

quote: Goodness is something that makes us serene and content; it is magnificent. Those who are not good are evil.
author: Bhumibol Adulyadej

quote: A good listener is not only popular everywhere, but after a while, he knows something.
author: Wilson Mizner

quote: Good enough never is.
author: Debbi Fields

quote: The momentous thing in human life is the art of winning the soul to good or evil.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: No one can be good for long if goodness is not in demand.
author: Bertolt Brecht

quote: It is a good thing to learn caution from the misfortunes of others.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: No news at 4:30 a.m. is good.
author: Lady Bird Johnson

quote: He who bestows his goods upon the poor shall have as much again, and ten times more.
author: John Bunyan

quote: Be sweet, be good, and honest always.
author: Emma Bunton

quote: What is beautiful is good, and who is good will soon be beautiful.
author: Vita Sackville-West

quote: I'd rather be lucky than good.
author: Lefty Gomez

quote: A good indignation brings out all one's powers.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The 'good old times' - all times when old are good.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Acorns were good until bread was found.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Our will is always for our own good, but we do not always see what that is.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: It is the mark of a good action that it appears inevitable in retrospect.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Good advice is something a man gives when he is too old to set a bad example.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: I believe that we parents must encourage our children to become educated, so they can get into a good college that we cannot afford.
author: Dave Barry

quote: Good copy can't be written with tongue in cheek, written just for a living. You've got to believe in the product.
author: David Ogilvy

quote: Good thoughts bear good fruit, bad thoughts bear bad fruit.
author: James Allen

quote: Free is the best. Anything free is good.
author: Sandra Bullock

quote: Nothing leads to good that is not natural.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Please give me some good advice in your next letter. I promise not to follow it.
author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quote: I know that every good and excellent thing in the world stands moment by moment on the razor-edge of danger and must be fought for.
author: Thornton Wilder

quote: Have a very good reason for everything you do.
author: Laurence Olivier

quote: Good actions ennoble us, we are the sons of our own deeds.
author: Jean Paul

quote: That which is striking and beautiful is not always good, but that which is good is always beautiful.
author: Ninon de L'Enclos

quote: Either positive or negative comments are good because it shows I am still relevant.
author: Justin Guarini

quote: The more one has seen of the good, the more one asks for the better.
author: John Mason Brown

quote: I don't think I am any good. If I thought I was any good, I wouldn't be.
author: John Betjeman

quote: If it were better, it wouldn't be as good.
author: Brendan Gill
